text:
In startup/shutdown procedure, on an Alpha server (did not test on other platform)

catalina.sh start  -> server is starting properly
catalina.sh stop -> server is stopping (not reachable anymore) BUT class
org.apache.catalina.startup.Bootstrap is still running:

ps -ef | grep catalina
test  374813      1  0.0 12:28:05 pts/6        0:11.94 /usr/opt/java141/bin/java
-Djava.endorsed.dirs=/applitest/appltest/jakarta-tomcat-4.1.24-LE-jdk14/common/endorsed
-classpath
/usr/opt/java141/lib/tools.jar:/applitest/appltest/jakarta-tomcat-4.1.24-LE-jdk14/bin/bootstrap.jar
-Dcatalina.base=/applitest/appltest/jakarta-tomcat-4.1.24-LE-jdk14
-Dcatalina.home=/applitest/appltest/jakarta-tomcat-4.1.24-LE-jdk14
-Djava.io.tmpdir=/applitest/appltest/jakarta-tomcat-4.1.24-LE-jdk14/temp
org.apache.catalina.startup.Bootstrap start
creator: nisol.fabien@hydro.qc.ca

text:
This is usually an issue with a deployed application. Try searching the tomcat-
user archives for more information and then post on the tomcat-user mailing 
list if you still have any questions.
